choices.name: Get started with research for Armenia ancestors.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research and records. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Armenia genealogy in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Armenia Genealogy
    ☆ AA—Armenian Genealogy

  2. Learn about researching your Armenian roots in these articles.

    ☆ Research Your Armenian Roots, Part I
    ☆ Research Your Armenian Roots, Part VI

  3. Get tips on how to fill in your Armenian family tree.

    ☆ FS—How to Fill in Your Armenian Family Tree

  4. Learn about Armenian culture in this article.

    ☆ FS—All About Armenian Culture

  5. Learn how to access Armenian records in the FamilySearch Catalog.

    ☆ RT—Accessing Records for Armenia Using the FamilySearch Catalog—5:54


  6. Learn about metrical books and tax lists for Armenia.

    ☆ RT—An Overview of Metrical Books and Tax Lists for Armenia—13:12



    7. Surnames
  7. Learn about the meaning of Armenian surnames.

    ☆ FS—Discovering the Meaning of Your Armenian Family Name

Surnames

QUIKLinks

1. Search for a variety of Armenian records on ☆Forebears.io and ☆ Geneanet Search.
  2. Explore Armenian cemetery records on the ☆ BillionGraves site. ☆
  3. Explore Armenian cemetery records on the ☆ Find A Grave site
  4. Explore resources for maps on the ☆ David Rumsey site.
  5. Explore resources for ☆ online newspapers in Armenia.
  6. Use the ☆ Facebook: Armenian Genealogy or the ☆ Facebook: Armenian DNA Project groups to connect with others doing Armenian research.

choices.name: Get started with research for Israeli ancestors.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research and records. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Israel genealogy in the FamilySearch Wiki.

    ☆ FS—Israel Genealogy

  2. Study this Israel research guide for tips.

    ☆ Israel Research Guide

  3. Learn more about researching your Israeli roots.

    ☆ Research Your Armenian Roots, Part II (scroll down)

  4. Learn about the main Archives of Israel.

    ☆ RT—The Main Archives in Israel—14:52


  5. Explore the ☆ Israel Genealogy Research Association site.

QUIKLinks

choices.name: Explore resources for research in Israel.

content.text:
1. Search for a variety of Israeli records on ☆Forebears.io and ☆Geneanet Search.
  2. Search for ☆Israeli surnames in a number of databases.
  3. Explore Israel cemetery records on the ☆BillionGraves site.
  4. Explore Israel cemetery records on the ☆Find A Grave site.
  5. Explore resources for maps on the ☆David Rumsey site.
  6. Explore resources for ☆online newspapers in Israel.
  7. Explore resources on the ☆The Central Zionist Archives site.
  8. Use the ☆Israel Genealogy Research Facebook page to connect with others doing Israeli research.

choices.name: Get started with research for Lebanese ancestors.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research and records. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Lebanon genealogy in the FamilySearch Wiki.

    ☆ FS—Lebanon Genealogy

  2. Study this guide for tips on research in Lebanon.

    ☆ American University of Beirut - Genealogy

  3. Learn about researching your Lebanese roots in this article.

    ☆ Research Your Armenian Roots, Part II

  4. Learn about Lebanese culture in this article.

    ☆ Lebanese Culture

1. Search for a variety of Lebanese records on ☆Forebears.io and ☆Geneanet Search.
    2. Explore Lebanese cemetery records on the ☆ BillionGraves site.
    3. Explore Lebanese cemetery records on the ☆ Find A Grave site.
    4. Explore resources for maps on the ☆ David Rumsey site
    5. Explore resources for ☆ online newspapers in Lebanon.
    6. Use the ☆ Facebook: Lebanese Genealogy page to connect with others doing Lebanese research.

choices.name: Get started with research for Sri Lanka ancestors.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research and records. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Sri Lanka genealogy in the FamilySearch Wiki.

    ☆ FS—Sri Lanka Genealogy

  2. Get an introduction to research in Sri Lanka.

    ☆ Genealogy Research in Sri Lanka

  3. Learn about Sri Lankan culture in this article.

    ☆ Cultural Atlas: Sri Lanka

  4. Learn how to trace your ancestry on the Indian subcontinent.

    ☆ Tracing Your Asian Roots on the Indian Subcontinent

  5. Explore ☆ Family Tree Data of Sri Lankan Communities.
  6. Explore ☆ Genealogy Indexes and Records for Sri Lanka.

QUIKLinks

choices.name: Explore Sri Lanka resources for research.

content.text:
1. Search for a variety of Sri Lankan records on ☆Forebears.io and ☆ Geneanet Search.
  2. Explore Sri Lankan cemetery records on the ☆ BillionGraves site.
  3. Explore Sri Lankan cemetery records on the ☆ Find A Grave site.
  4. Explore resources for maps on the ☆ David Rumsey site.
  5. Explore resources for ☆ online newspapers in Sri Lanka.
